headline: Is Analyst Scrutiny Of Incentive Costs And Integration Challenges Altering The Investment Case For Celsius (CELH)?
summary: In recent weeks, Celsius Holdings has drawn fresh analyst attention as firms including Piper Sandler, KeyBanc, Stifel, Morgan Stanley, and UBS reassessed the company following a prior quarter’s US$61,000,000 net loss and ongoing integration of acquired brands into the PepsiCo distribution system. These differing analyst views highlight growing focus on how higher incentive costs, operational integration hurdles, and evolving partner relationships could affect Celsius’s near-term operating...
